content:
<NicolasCsgy> Hey guys - L2 Interop Working Group in 90 min -  https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1229

Meeting Info:
Time/Date: Jan 15, 2025, 17:00-18:00 UTC
sign up for calendar invite here
Zoom: https://ethereumfoundation.zoom.us/j/89569077828?pwd=sACQiWQLKbDxI5vEEyAz5QHi490uRK.1

Agenda
chain-specific addresses (ERC-7828 (https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/erc-7828-chain-specific-addresses-using-ens/21930))
cross-chain messaging standards (see list here (https://notes.ethereum.org/-iCuX3YpTHK-GAkaMOu6oQ?view#3-Cross-chain-messaging-amp-shared-bridges))
RIP-7859 (https://github.com/ethereum/RIPs/blob/master/RIPS/rip-xxxx.md): Store L1 origin data and historic L2 block hashes in L2 state
